name: 1GAW - Week 5
description:
Note: This is a small prototype just for the sake of practicing animating characters within Unity, and playing around with the Shapes asset. I spend about 3 days on this project.

This is a small prototype for a game where you are trying to herd Rabbitsheep (or Sheeprabbits?) into their pen. It's only one level and you can finish it in like a minute or two, as it's just a proof of concept.

Source code: https://github.com/Reccy/1GAW_5

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Left Stick to Move

Spacebar or A Button to BARK

Alt+F4 to QUIT GAME
